AI Description: TPMCalculator is a computational tool that enables the quantification of gene expression levels from RNA-Seq data based on the transcripts per million (TPM) method. TPM calculations normalize read counts by the length of the transcripts and the total number of mapped reads, providing a more accurate representation of gene expression levels.
Core Features: Quantification Of Gene Expression Levels From RNA-Seq Data, Uses Transcripts Per Million (Tpm) Method For Normalization, Accurate Representation Of Gene Expression Levels
